attributes.action: compel the BBC to adopt a neutral position on the reporting of Anthropological Global Warming issue.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As tax payers who fund this organisation, we demand that their  representation of the debate on an issue which is completely unproven, is done from an unbiased perspective, as opposed to the pro-AGW stance which they have adopted thus far.

The BBC's domestic and international credibility for unbiased reporting is severely compromised while they persist (through the tone and emphasis of their content) in: 

Promoting the AGW agenda, and at the same time (unlike Reuters) playing down or blatantly avoiding the competent reporting of events which call into question the integrity of the IPCC scientists at the very core of the Anthropological Global Warming debate.

rejection.details: The Government does not control content on the BBC. This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
